attributes.action: give the people of the UK back Parliament Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament Square, one of the most treasured sites in London, and a world heritage site, has been turned into a cheap campsite by protestor Brian Haw. The grass is being ruined it looks awful to the thousands of tourists who visit the site, is this the impression we want to give of the UK, the mother of parliaments? For or against the war, the protest should be stopped! It is the British People's square and WE WANT IT BACK!
